excerpt: "Julia Stoyanovich,  is a professor at NYU’s Tandon School of Engineering and founding Director of the Center for Responsible AI. She recently delivered testimony to the NYC Council’s Committee on Technology about a proposed bill that would regulate the use of AI for hiring and employment decision."
